Class Shape

Parent abstract class for all the Shapes.

Namespace: graphical_programming_language
Assembly: graphical-programming-language.dll
Syntax
public abstract class Shape : IShapes
Remarks

This class implements IShapes interface and provides abstract and virtual methods for child Shape classes to override.

Declaration
public Shape(Color color, bool isColorFillOn, int x, int y)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Drawing.Color color

Color of the Rectangle.
System.Boolean isColorFillOn

Boolean flag to either turn or off the Color fill for the Shape.
System.Int32 x

The X-Coordinate to draw Shape in.
System.Int32 y

The Y-Coordinate to draw Shape in.
Remarks

Initializes a new instances of Shape, with the given parameters.
